Class DirectMessage.ChatListCell

java.lang.Object

application.DirectMessage.ChatListCell
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget, javafx.scene.control.Skinnable
Enclosing class:
DirectMessage
private static class DirectMessage.ChatListCell extends javafx.scene.control.ListCell<DirectMessage.ChatListItem>
Custom cell renderer for chat list items.

This class defines how each chat item is displayed in the list view, including formatting for unread messages.

  • Method Details

    • updateItem

      protected void updateItem(DirectMessage.ChatListItem item, boolean empty)
      Updates the cell with data from the chat item.

      This method is called by JavaFX to update the cell when it becomes visible or when the data changes.

      Overrides:
      updateItem in class javafx.scene.control.Cell<DirectMessage.ChatListItem>
      Parameters:
      item - The chat item to display
      empty - Whether the cell is empty
